birth.name: Diana Tai
birth.description: thank you for teaching me the importance of honesty and always bringing a contagious excitement to every movie we watch

birth.name: Jerry Hsiao
birth.description: thank you for demonstrating the importance of apologizing and showing me the beauty of nature

birth.name: Jeriann Hsiao
birth.description: thank you for setting such an excellent example for me in school, piano, and life! you unironically are the best sister

elementary school.name: Norah Langton
elementary school.description: thank you for introducing me to the world of piano - it has become such an integral part of who I am today

elementary school.name: Linda Penrice
elementary school.description: thank you for welcoming me to elementary school a year early and laying the foundation for my public speaking skills

elementary school.name: Amy Hall
elementary school.description: thank you for encouraging me to continue learning music and showing me how I can use these talents in worship

elementary school.name: Caleb Mulder
elementary school.description: thank you for being the best workout buddy and inspiring me to be courageous in my faith

elementary school.name: Paul Chen
elementary school.description: thank you for exhibiting how important it is to bring a seemingly-infinite amount of enthusiasm to anything I lead

elementary school.name: Elliot Pai
elementary school.description: thank you for being as close to a brother that I could have - I owe a lot of my sillyness to you!

elementary school.name: Carina Pai
elementary school.description: thank you for your ever-so-delicious cakes and initiating the next line of waterloo engineering

elementary school.name: Jeremy Kuikman
elementary school.description: thank you for igniting my love for math (and dodgeball)

elementary school.name: Terry Ciona
elementary school.description: thank you for leading the church with authenticity and always encouraging us to give back to the community

high school.name: Matt Bunch
high school.description: thank you for helping me overcome my fear of rollercoasters

high school.name: Scott Edwards
high school.description: thank you for making every day of class such an enjoyable and memorable experience - you helped me feel welcome throughout the transition into high school

high school.name: Nicola Dean
high school.description: thank you for being such a kind soul, always making yourself available to chat, and filling up the halls of our school with your laughter

high school.name: AJ Vaspori
high school.description: thank you for demonstrating that with enough hard work, you truly could achieve perfection in courses. I guess effort really can be success!

high school.name: Brianna Tate
high school.description: thanks for always keeping me company by that staircase while we were waiting for our rides to come pick us up

high school.name: Matt Weil
high school.description: thank you for sacrificing so much of your time and energy to support our school's music programs

high school.name: Brenda Csordas
high school.description: thank you for having such a contagious passion for biology and dedicating so much of your time to helping me prepare for university

high school.name: Brian Garcia
high school.description: thank you for providing me with the advice and environment to grow my love for chess

high school.name: Michael D'Agostino
high school.description: thank you for using your incredible intelligence to very patiently teach us about chemistry and edit my scholarship applications

high school.name: Stephanie Taylor
high school.description: thank you for always encouraging me to put out my best work and just being an all around cool teacher!

high school.name: Nolan Cross
high school.description: thank you for demonstrating what a true passion and appreciation for music and the piano looks like

high school.name: Abbie Game
high school.description: thank you for being so so kind and supportive to me throughout high school

high school.name: Kaelyn Banse
high school.description: thank you for being such an inspiring creative, a kind classmate, and an excellent photography partner

high school.name: Dave McCreary
high school.description: thank you for introducing me to the world of graphic design - without it I would have never discovered my passion for UX/UI design!

high school.name: Tavia Gairns
high school.description: thank you for being the person I could bounce graphic designs off of by day and rock dance floors with by night

high school.name: Naomi Wratten
high school.description: thank you for providing me with the community and opportunities to push my limits as a pianist

high school.name: Richard Eyre
high school.description: thank you for demonstrating the importance of understanding our past to prepare for our future and just being an all-around fantastic and respectable teacher

high school.name: Gurnoor Minhas
high school.description: thank you for showing me that, yes, Brantford kids can actually make an impact on the world!

high school.name: Graham Brown
high school.description: thank you for extending my passion for math beyond the classroom - after all, there are no equations to travel to the moon

high school.name: Max Archer
high school.description: thank you for inspiring me to improve how I articulate my arguments and thoughts

high school.name: Nicole Pugh
high school.description: thank you for just radiating kindness and light in every situation - i really appreciate it

high school.name: Lina Elsaadi
high school.description: thank you for reminding me how good it feels to vibe with someone you share so much in common with

high school.name: David Dean
high school.description: thank you for guiding me through my responsibilities as a student trustee and patiently supporting me in my campaigns for student wellbeing

high school.name: Jade Martin
high school.description: thank you for providing me company during our walks to HEROS and always making the most aesthetic yearbook signings and biology notes!

high school.name: Christopher Tracy
high school.description: thank you for never shying away from constructively criticizing my work - your class has truly refined me into a better writer and communicator

high school.name: Becca Vrolyk
high school.description: thank you for being an amazing photography partner - i always looked forward to our shooting sessions and the ensuing friendly competition

high school.name: Danielle Curtis
high school.description: thank you for stretching my photography and creativity to limits that I would have never imagined

university.name: David Mahn
university.description: thank you for helping me create my first resume and just being an all-around cool guy

university.name: Aaron Dyck
university.description: thank you for always being calm no matter the situation - I'm so glad that you were the first person that I met in uni!

university.name: David Ryu
university.description: thank you for reviving my faith out of its lukewarmness and challenging me to boldly pursue Christ

university.name: Dasol Lee
university.description: thank you for making me feel welcome at Kingdom Come and always being so supportive!

university.name: Emily Louie
university.description: thank you for supporting me as we walked through mentorships, workshops, designathons, portfolios, co-ops, and conferences together!

university.name: Daniel Raymond
university.description: thank you for striving to create communities and patiently explaining everything from linear algebra to circuitry to me

university.name: Daniel Kwon
university.description: thank you for providing me with invaluable resume advice and guiding me through my first co-op application season

university.name: Judy Zhong
university.description: thank you for inspiring me to pursue product design and coaching me through design interview questions

university.name: Michael Shiozaki
university.description: thank you for welcoming me to my first year of university acapella!

university.name: Matthew Kee
university.description: thank you for being such a welcoming face both in and out of class - you light up everywhere you go with your energy and humour

university.name: Martha Matsui
university.description: thank you for engaging in our endless mischiefs and always being such a good sport for abby and I's jokes

university.name: Andrew Chow
university.description: a true brother in Christ - thank you for encouraging me through my first year of university and allowing me to honestly share my burdens

university.name: Vevina Trinh
university.description: thank you for guiding me through the portfolio ideation, design, and development process

university.name: Chalyn Pai
university.description: thank you for baking the most delicious treats and sharing in my appreciation of a good hug

university.name: Xiaopu Fung
university.description: thank you for taking a chance on me, showing me how rewarding public service can be, and demonstrating how to promote diversity from a leadership role

university.name: Muiz Sohani
university.description: thank you for bringing an infectious enthusiasm and playfulness to our work - you truly made every day enjoyable!

university.name: Niya Xu
university.description: thank you for approaching work with such a lighthearted energy - i miss everything from your kpop dance practices to your neverending excitement for food

university.name: Lukas Rossi
university.description: thank you for helping me develop my first portfolio and being the first example of a Christian in the tech industry that I have met!

university.name: James Kelly
university.description: thank you for creating an outlet for so many Christians to use their skills to further God's Kingdom

university.name: Abbie Goulet
university.description: thank you for connecting me to a fantastic initiative and inspiring me to use my UI/UX design skills for God's kingdom

university.name: Ken Ives
university.description: thank you for building a supportive community where people can develop their vocal skills together

university.name: Darren Allarde
university.description: thank you for introducing me to the team and teaching me that slowing down is sometimes the healthiest path to take

university.name: Joe Dara
university.description: thank you for openly exchanging design advice with me throughout the design-to-dev implementation of the platform

university.name: Magdalene Lee
university.description: thank you for patiently teaching me front-end development best practices and Git hygiene

university.name: Abby Chan
university.description: thank you for always participating in our online school shenanigans and making me laugh SO hard during lectures

university.name: Igor Ivkovic
university.description: thank you for fascinating me with the intricacies of computer architecture and caring so much for your students both inside and outside of the classroom

university.name: Shi Cao
university.description: thank you for blending interactivity and art into your lectures

university.name: Stephen Birkett
university.description: thank you for actually applying the complex topics we learn in class to real-life situations!

university.name: Simon Wood
university.description: thank you for your endless enthusiasm and humour when it comes to music history - you've transformed the way that I view the subject

university.name: Sharon Zheng
university.description: thank you for inspiring me to integrate my love for design and development into my passion projects

university.name: Julia Woodcock
university.description: thank you for bringing a lighthearted attitude as we tackled CUTC's marketing campaign together

university.name: Carol Yao
university.description: thank you for generously giving your time to help me prepare for portfolio reviews and design challenges
